reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is ok in terms of room cleanliness, rooms are quite small as would be expected for a hotel in the main tourist area.
reviews.title: Why was the man in our room when we opened the door one afternoon?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was very easy to find because the hotel had sent us an excellent map of how to get there from the station.
reviews.title: hard to find but worth the effort
